channel.title: My Program

item.title: My Program
item.dc:creator: @Fat_Cookies Fat Cookies
item.description:
@Fat_Cookies wrote:

/**
 *
 * @author Fat Cookies
 */
public class Client {

    public static int[] vun = {-144, 900001, -216, -216, -222, -64};
    public static String[] cal = {"10101110", "11011110", "11100100"};
    public static String diq = "f1lx49fa5br4dda0c8d95f0f302b01c6";

    public Client(String s) {
        super();
        StringBuilder ssbbsbsb = new StringBuilder();
        if (s.startsWith("S") && s.length() == 5) {
            for (int i = 0; i < vun.length; i++) {
                ssbbsbsb.append(getUno(vun[i]));
            }
            for (String ss : cal) {
                ssbbsbsb.append(getUno(getZe(ss)));
            }

            ssbbsbsb.append(diq.substring(2, 3) + diq.substring(12, 13));
            ssbbsbsb.append("\u0021\n");
            GOGOGO(ssbbsbsb.toString());
        } else {
            System.exit(0);
        }
    }

    public void GOGOGO(String s) {
        char guz[] = s.toCharArray();
        for(char gigi: guz) {
            System.out.print(gigi);
        }
    }

    public int getTres(int i) {
        return ~(((i << 2) + i) / 20) + 1;
    }

    public int getDos(int i) {
        if (i == vun[1]) {
            return 101;
        } else {
            return getTres(2 * i);
        }
    }

    public char getUno(int i) {
        char c = 0x0;
        return c += getDos(i);
    }

    public static int getZe(String s) {
        int result = Integer.parseInt(s, 2);
        return (~result) + 1;
    }

    public static void main(String[] args) {
        char c[] = {0x53, 0x74, 0x61, 0x72, 0x74};
        StringBuilder sb = new StringBuilder();
        for (char c2 : c) {
            sb.append(c2);
        }
        Client lol = new Client(sb.toString());
    }
}

Please make my code shorter.
